該裝置識別碼已被新增。
A negative number of days doesn't make s: 一個負的天數並不合理。
A new major version may not be compatibl: 新的主要版本可能與以前的版本不相容。
Add devices from the introducer to our d: 對於共用的資料夾，匯入引入者的裝置清單。
Additionally the full rescan interval wi: Additionally the full rescan interval will be increased (times 60, i.e. new default of 1h). You can also configure it manually for every folder later after choosing No.
All folders shared with this device must: All folders shared with this device must be protected by a password, such that all sent data is unreadable without the given password.
Allow Anonymous Usage Reporting?: 允許匿名的使用資訊回報?
An external command handles the versioni: An external command handles the versioning. It has to remove the file from the shared folder. If the path to the application contains spaces, it should be quoted.
Anonymous usage report format has change: 匿名的使用資訊回報格式已經改變，你想要移至新格式嗎？
Are you sure you want to permanently del: Are you sure you want to permanently delete all these files?
Are you sure you want to remove folder {: 確定要移除 {{label}} 資料夾？
Are you sure you want to restore {%count: 確定想要還原 {{count}} 個檔案？
Are you sure you want to upgrade?: Are you sure you want to upgrade?
Automatic upgrade now offers the choice: 自動更新目前有穩定發行版及發行候選版可供選擇。
Automatic upgrades are always enabled fo: Automatic upgrades are always enabled for candidate releases.
Automatically create or share folders th: 自動在預設資料夾路徑建立或分享該裝置推薦的資料夾。
Click to see discovery failures: 點擊以查閱失敗的探索
Comment, when used at the start of a lin: 註解，當輸入在一行的開頭時
Continuously watching for changes is now: Syncthing 現在能持續地監視變動了。此機制將偵測到磁碟上的變動並僅對修改過的項目發起掃描。好處是檔案的變動會傳播的更快，並且較不需要完整掃描。
Creating ignore patterns, overwriting an: 建立忽略樣式，覆蓋已存在的 {{path}}。
Deselect devices to stop sharing this fo: Deselect devices to stop sharing this folder with.
Deselect folders to stop sharing with th: Deselect folders to stop sharing with this device.
Device \"{%name%}\" ({%device%} at {%add: 裝置 "{{name}}" ({{device}} 位於 {{address}}) 想要連線。要增加新裝置嗎？
Device is untrusted, enter encryption pa: Device is untrusted, enter encryption password
Disabled periodic scanning and disabled: 已停用定期掃描及觀察變動
Disabled periodic scanning and enabled w: 已停用定期掃描及啟用觀察變動
Disabled periodic scanning and failed se: 已停用定期掃描，無法設定觀察變動，每 1 分鐘重試：
Disables comparing and syncing file perm: Disables comparing and syncing file permissions. Useful on systems with nonexistent or custom permissions (e.g. FAT, exFAT, Synology, Android).
Do you want to enable watching for chang: 您要對全部的資料夾啟用變動監視嗎？
Enter a non-negative number (e.g., \"2.3: 請輸入一非負數（如："2\.35"）並選擇一個單位。百分比表示佔用磁碟容量的大小。
Enter a non-privileged port number (1024: 輸入一個非特權通訊埠號 (1024 - 65535)。
Enter comma separated (\"tcp://ip:port\": Enter comma separated ("tcp://ip:port", "tcp://host:port") addresses or "dynamic" to perform automatic discovery of the address.
輸入忽略樣式，每行一種。
Enter up to three octal digits.
Failure to connect to IPv6 servers is ex: 若沒有 IPv6 連線能力，則無法連接 IPv6 伺服器係屬正常現象。
Files are moved to .stversions directory: 當檔案被 Syncthing 取代或刪除時，它們將被移至 .stversions 資料夾。
Files are moved to date stamped versions: 當檔案被 Syncthing 取代或刪除時，它們將被移至 .stversions 資料夾並添加日期戳記。
Files are protected from changes made on: 其他裝置做的改變不會影響此裝置上的檔案，但在此裝置上的變動將被發送到叢集的其他部分。
Files are synchronized from the cluster,: Files are synchronized from the cluster, but any changes made locally will not be sent to other devices.
Folder type \"{%receiveEncrypted%}\" can: Folder type "{{receiveEncrypted}}" cannot be changed after adding the folder. You need to remove the folder, delete or decrypt the data on disk, and add the folder again.
For the following folders an error occur: For the following folders an error occurred while starting to watch for changes. It will be retried every minute, so the errors might go away soon. If they persist, try to fix the underlying issue and ask for help if you can't.
GUI Authentication: Set User and Passwor: GUI Authentication: Set User and Password
However, your current settings indicate: However, your current settings indicate you might not want it enabled. We have disabled automatic crash reporting for you.
If you want to prevent other users on th: If you want to prevent other users on this computer from accessing Syncthing and through it your files, consider setting up authentication.
Incorrect configuration may damage your: 不正確的設定可能會損壞您的資料夾內容，並導致 Syncthing 不正常運作。
Inversion of the given condition (i.e. d: 反轉給定條件 (即：不要排除)
Log tailing paused. Scroll to the bottom: Log tailing paused. Scroll to the bottom to continue.
Multi level wildcard (matches multiple d: 多階層萬用字元 (可比對多層資料夾)
No files will be deleted as a result of: 此操作將不會移除您的檔案。
Optional descriptive label for the folde: 資料夾的說明標籤（選擇性）。在不同裝置上可不一致。
Path to the folder on the local computer: 資料夾在本機的路徑。若資料夾不存在則會建立。波浪符號 (~) 可用作下列資料夾的捷徑：
Path where new auto accepted folders wil: 新自動接受的資料夾將會建立在此路徑下，從 UI 加入資料夾時也將預設推薦此路徑。波浪符字元 (~) 將被展開為 {{tilde}}。
Path where versions should be stored (le: 儲存歷史版本的路徑（若為空，則預設使用資料夾中的 .stversions 資料夾。）
Periodic scanning at given interval and: 在一定的時間間隔，定期掃描及關閉觀察變動
在一定的時間間隔，定期掃描及啟用觀察變動
在一定的時間間隔，定期掃描，無法設定觀察變動，每 1 分鐘重試：
Please consult the release notes before: 執行重大升級前請先參閱版本資訊。
Please set a GUI Authentication User and: 請在設定對話框內設置 GUI 使用者認證名稱及密碼。
Prefix indicating that the file can be d: 前綴表示當此檔案阻礙了資料夾刪除時，可一併刪除此檔
Prefix indicating that the pattern shoul: 前綴表示此樣式不區分大小寫
Quick guide to supported patterns: 可支援樣式的快速指南
Release candidates contain the latest fe: 發行候選版包含最新的功能及修補。與傳統 Syncthing 雙週發行版相似。
Required identifier for the folder. Must: 資料夾的識別字。必須在叢集內所有的裝置上皆相同。
See external versioning help for support: 查看關於命令列模板參數請參閱外部版本管理說明。
Select additional devices to share this: Select additional devices to share this folder with.
Select additional folders to share with: Select additional folders to share with this device.
Select the folders to share with this de: 選擇要共享這個資料夾的裝置。
Show diff with previous version: 顯示與前一個版本的差異
Shown instead of Device ID in the cluste: 代替裝置識別碼顯示在叢集狀態中。這段文字將會廣播到其他的裝置作為一個可選的預設名稱。
代替裝置識別碼顯示在叢集狀態中。本欄若未填寫則將被更新為此裝置所廣播的名稱。
Single level wildcard (matches within a: 單階層萬用字元 (只在單個資料夾階層內比對)
Stable releases and release candidates: 穩定發行版及發行候選版
Stable releases are delayed by about two: 穩定發行版大約延遲兩週發佈。這段期間將作為發行候選版來測試。
Stores and syncs only encrypted data. Fo: Stores and syncs only encrypted data. Folders on all connected devices need to be set up with the same password or be of type "{{receiveEncrypted}}" too.
Sync Protocol Listen Addresses: 同步通訊協定監聽位址
Syncthing includes the following softwar: Syncthing 包括以下軟體或其中的一部分：
Syncthing is Free and Open Source Softwa: Syncthing is Free and Open Source Software licensed as MPL v2.0.
Syncthing now supports automatically rep: Syncthing now supports automatically reporting crashes to the developers. This feature is enabled by default.
Syncthing seems to be down, or there is: Syncthing 似乎離線了，或者您的網際網路連線出現問題。正在重試...
Syncthing seems to be experiencing a pro: Syncthing 在處理您的請求時似乎遇到了問題。請重新整理本頁面，若問題持續發生，請重新啟動 Syncthing。
The GUI address is overridden by startup: The GUI address is overridden by startup options. Changes here will not take effect while the override is in place.
The Syncthing admin interface is configu: Syncthing 管理介面被設定允許無密碼的遠端存取。
The aggregated statistics are publicly a: 匯總統計資訊可於下方網址取得。
The cleanup interval cannot be blank.
The configuration has been saved but not: 組態已經儲存但尚未啟用。Syncthing 必須重新啟動以便啟用新的組態。
裝置識別碼不能為空白。
The device ID to enter here can be found: 其它裝置的裝置識別碼可在它們的 "操作 > 顯示識別碼" 對話框找到。空白及連接符號可省略。
The encrypted usage report is sent daily: 經過加密的使用資訊報告會每天傳送。報告是用來追蹤常用的平台、資料夾大小以及應用程式版本。若傳送的資料集有異動，您會再次看到這個對話框。
The entered device ID does not look vali: 輸入的裝置識別碼似乎無效。它應該為一串長度為 52 或 56 個字元長的半形英文字母及數字，並可能會含有額外的空白或連接符號。
資料夾識別碼不能為空白。
資料夾識別碼必須為獨一無二的。
The following intervals are used: for th: 使用下列的間隔：在第一個小時內每 30 秒保留一個版本，在第一天內每小時保留一個版本，在第 30 天內每一天保留一個版本，在達到最長保留時間前每一星期保留一個版本。
The following items were changed locally: The following items were changed locally.
The following unexpected items were foun: The following unexpected items were found.
The interval must be a positive number o: The interval must be a positive number of seconds.
The interval, in seconds, for running cl: The interval, in seconds, for running cleanup in the versions directory. Zero to disable periodic cleaning.
The maximum age must be a number and can: 最長保留時間必須為一個數字且不得為空。
The maximum time to keep a version (in d: 一個版本被保留的最長時間 (單位為天，若設定為 0 則表示永遠保留)。
The number of days must be a number and: 天數必須必須為一個數字且不得為空。
The number of days to keep files in the: 檔案在垃圾筒中保留的天數。零表示永遠地保留。
The number of old versions to keep, per: 每個檔案要保留的舊版本數量。
The number of versions must be a number: 每個檔案要保留的舊版本數量必須是數字且不能為空白。
The rate limit must be a non-negative nu: 限制速率必須為非負的數字 (0: 不設限制)
The rescan interval must be a non-negati: 重新掃描間隔必須為一個非負數的秒數。
There are no devices to share this folde: There are no devices to share this folder with.
There are no folders to share with this: There are no folders to share with this device.
They are retried automatically and will: 解決問題後，將會自動重試和同步。
This can easily give hackers access to r: 這能給駭客輕易的來讀取、變更電腦中的任何檔案。
這是一個重大版本更新。
This setting controls the free space req: 此設定控制家目錄（即：索引資料庫）的必須可用空間。
Trash Can File Versioning: 垃圾筒式檔案版本控制
Unavailable/Disabled by administrator or: 無法使用 / 被系統管理員或維護者停用
Unexpected items have been found in this: Unexpected items have been found in this folder.
Usage reporting is always enabled for ca: 發行候選版永遠啟用使用數據回報。
Username/Password has not been set for t: Username/Password has not been set for the GUI authentication. Please consider setting it up.
Versions are automatically deleted if th: 當檔案歷史版本的存留時間大於設定的最大值，或是其數量在一段時間內超出允許值時，則會被刪除。
Warning, this path is a parent directory: 警告，此路徑是現存資料夾 "{{otherFolder}}" 的上級目錄。
警告，此路徑是現存資料夾 "{{otherFolderLabel}}" ({{otherFolder}}) 的上級目錄。
Warning, this path is a subdirectory of: 警告，此路徑是現存資料夾 "{{otherFolder}}" 的下級目錄。
警告，此路徑是現存資料夾 "{{otherFolderLabel}}" ({{otherFolder}}) 的下級目錄。
Warning: If you are using an external wa: 警告：如果您正在使用外部監視工具，如 {{syncthingInotify}}，您應該確認已經將其關閉。
Watching for changes discovers most chan: Watching for changes discovers most changes without periodic scanning.
When adding a new device, keep in mind t: 當新增一個裝置時，務必記住，當前的這個裝置也同樣必須被添加至另一邊。
When adding a new folder, keep in mind t: 當新增一個資料夾時，請記住，資料夾識別碼是用來將裝置之間的資料夾綁定在一起的。它們有區分大小寫，且必須在所有裝置之間完全相同。
You can also select one of these nearby: 您亦可從這些附近裝置中擇一：
You can change your choice at any time i: 您可以在設定對話框中隨時更改您的選擇。
You can read more about the two release: 您可於下方連結閱讀更多關於發行頻道的說明。
您沒有已忽略的資料夾。
You have unsaved changes. Do you really: You have unsaved changes. Do you really want to discard them?
您必須保留至少一個版本。
You should never add or change anything: You should never add or change anything locally in a "{{receiveEncrypted}}" folder.
